hero.title: Move Your Body with
hero.subtitle: The Global Dance Fitness Experience
hero.description: Join millions worldwide in the most energetic dance fitness program. Get certified, find classes, and transform your fitness journey with rhythm and movement.
hero.certification: Officially Certified by the International Dance Council (CID-UNESCO)

about.title: About
about.introduction: Founded by the visionary Captain Sherif, Hawssa Dance Fitness has revolutionized the way people experience fitness through dance.
about.description: HAWSSA® is a mentor program guided by amazing and professional trainers; we focus on easy but effective steps, fun and trending music and as a plus we breakdown each choreography for easy learning. Our target is to enlarge HAWSSA family, so we accept all ages, sizes, shapes, not matter where you are from or how you look. We are here to dance with you while you get fit.
about.additionalDescription: Our target is to enlarge HAWSSA family, so we accept all ages, sizes, shapes, not matter where you are from or how you look. We are here to dance with you while you get fit.
about.visionTitle: To inspire people worldwide to move, connect, and transform through dance fitness
about.visionDescription: HAWSSA® is a fun, fitness dance to keep fit. It is designed for all people from different ages who are looking for a happy fit hour. As long as we can conquer your heart and make you move your feet, you are ready to become part of HAWSSA® family.
about.teamDescription: Our expert trainers bring passion and energy to every step, delivering an unparalleled dance fitness experience

joinAsTrainer.onsiteDescription: Join our live in-person sessions and connect with other trainers
joinAsTrainer.onlineDescription: Train from anywhere, interact with students in real time
joinAsTrainer.hybridDescription: Train from anywhere, interact with students in real time
joinAsTrainer.totDescription: Our TOT program is designed for passionate fitness and dance professionals who want to expand their impact. By joining, you'll gain exclusive access to Hawssa's rich archive of training materials and reach over 1 million users who already trust Hawssa to guide their fitness journey.
